price: Dan sekali-kali janganlah kamu termasuk orang-orang yang mendustakan ayat-ayat Allah yang menyebabkan kamu termasuk orang-orang yang merugi.
arabic: وَلَا تَكُونَنَّ مِنَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَذَّبُواْ بِـَٔايَٰتِ ٱللَّهِ فَتَكُونَ مِنَ ٱلۡخَٰسِرِينَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: walā takūnanna mina alladhīna kadhabū biāyāti al-lahi fatakūna mina al-khāsirīna
